title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday January 7, 2015
byline: Adam Allington, Sally Herships, Caroline Losneck, Sabri Ben-Achour and David Gura
description: Airing on Wednesday January 7, 2015: First up on today's show, new data from the European Union shows consumer prices in the eurozone were down in December, which could mean consumers and companies postpone investments. More on that. Plus, President Obama is in Michigan boasting about saving auto worker jobs. But what is the cost of saving factory jobs by accepting lower wages? And from the floor of the 2015 consumer electronics show, we talk to reporter Nova Safo about the future of connected cars.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday January 7, 2015
